problem.markdown:
For water, which of the following properties for a liquid state are always more than that for a solid state?
[x] h [x] u [ ] v [ ] None of the above.
[explanation] In case of water, (c) will not be more! [explanation]
problem.p: For water, which of the following properties for a liquid state are always more than that for a solid state?

div.p: In case of water, (c) will not be more!
